Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Case.Account}:
Please follow these instructions to send a Western Union payment:
PLEASE NOTE: This information can NOT be used for a Wire or ACH Payment
Western Union Instructions
→ Pay Online:
Visit: www.westernunion.com Click “Pay Bills” at the top of the page Enter biller as: WEX Wright Express Enter payment amount and your fuel account number Select the payment type and delivery speed Log in or create the Western Union account You will receive a receipt with a Money Transfer Control Number (MTCN)
→ Pay in person:
First: Find an Agent location: Visit: www.westernunion.com Click “Find Locations” at the top of page OR Call: 1.800.325.6000
Once at Western Union location:
You will need to fill out the Yellow “Your Information” section of the form You will need to fill out the Blue “Pay A Bill” section of the form: Critical Fields:
Biller/Company Name = WEX ME Account Number = Reference your fuel account number Attention = Receivables Department
You will receive a receipt with a Money Transfer Control Number (MTCN)
NOTE: For faster processing, please respond to this email indicating the Western Union is sent and included the MTCN Number. I will then take the appropriate next action and notify you!
SAME DAY POSTING CUTOFF – 3:00 PM EST
Payment must be made with Cash or Debit Card
Thank you!
Receivables and Credit Management
{!Case.Collections_Phone_Number__c}
